name: Wizard Snake
description:
Wizard Snake is a die-and-retry Metroid-Vania gravity-based platformer!

You must find runes to be able to switch between the correct gravity which will let you advance in the level!

Wizard Snake is hard, you will need to master the Snake to advance into the 9 levels (5 normal + 4 dark hardcore levels) and master the gravity if you want to collect the 63 diamonds!

Controls:

Arrows: Move

TOP arrow: Jump

Spacebar: Change gravity

H: Hide/Show gravity indicators.

A game made by Paul Eyheramouno on Construct 2.
